pos:
When we checked in, the lady behind the counter realised it was my birthday and upgraded us to a higher level room.
They even left a chocolate cake in the room for when we returned from the pool
cons: Getting food and drinks around the pool was very slow, there needed to be more staff working

title: Once in a live time - you shall see it....
pos:
Early Check in and even late check-out was possible.
Very nice start - checkin with Mark - very engaged and enthuiastic!
Room: large and very well equipped with a great view as advertised.
Spectacular infinity rooftop pool.
Impressive light show to be seen from room window at 8pm and 9pm
cons:
The bathroom is large and nice, however, the shower is missing a hand shower.
At midnight we had to call the utility service becaue the toilet was stucked.

title: Absolutely worth it!
pos: I loved it. I wasnt sure about booking it but it was absolutely worth it. I had amazing sea views from my room. I slept with the curtains open because I couldnt block out those great views. The room was spacious and the bathtub was sublime. Absolute bliss!

title: MBS
pos: We had a fantastic stay at MBS, for such a large complex couldn't believe the speed of check in and out we were upgraded on check in to 50th floor and it made our stay so unforgettable.

title: Stunning MDS
pos: Amazing location, I came to Singapore for U2 concert and choose MDS hotel since it was in my to do list in Asia. I will for sure come back at MDS hotel

title: Iconic Hotel
pos: Worth every penny, an incredible experience staying here and really made our trip to Singapore. The view from our room, the infinity pool, the roof top bars was just incredible. Plenty to do on the Marina Bay grounds and within walking distance to keep busy for at least a couple days. There is a reason this hotel is prominently featured and there is nowhere like it on Earth. It's a Sands property, owner of Venetian/Palazzo so Vegas style amenities with hundreds of shops/restaurants/gaming/shows/gondola ride on property. This is not your every day hotel and a stay here will define your trip to Singapore and if the beginning of an Asian vacation, a great kick off to spend 2-3 nights. Have to get cocktails at Spagos or Ce La Vi roof top bars.
cons: A little pricey and massive. But you get what you pay for and have all the amenities of this iconic property. The gym is surprisingly small and basic for such an epic property.

title: Amazing! Pool was a dream come true!
pos: My stay was amazing, exceeded my expectation. I loved staying at the hotel and especially enjoyed the roof top yoga in the morning and the pool (opening times from 6am - 11pm were great). I did not go to any of the restaurants, only the pool side service (prices were ok).

title: Super pool,  clean rooms great location.
pos:
Super pool,  clean rooms great location. 
Nise acomodation personal very helpful. 
Reception in tower 3 personal badly.
cons:
Checkout  is terrible  , my plain yearly in the morning.
Reception desk opened from 7am. 
They say can drop cards in box , and we sorted all later one.
Ye they send , only how I like hotel .
But about invoice , for what I have pay and why is bigger price .
I didn't got and didn't receive yet .

title: Need to lower expectation to make it ok
pos: The location is great and the view from the deck (57th floor) is amazing. There are so many good restaurants in the hotel and the maill itself. You need to make reservations in advance otherwise get ready to start your dinner at 9pm.
cons: With the price, I was expecting the roomâ€™s quality similar to Four Seasons or Ritz Carlton; however, to me the room looks like a regular 4-star in US or other part of Asia. Nothing scream â€œluxuriousâ€. The pools and sun decks are super crowded like in Carribean cruise ship. Very difficult to get a proper swimming exercise.

title: The highlight of the hotel is the pool and observation deck on the 57th floor. View is spectacular!!
pos:
The infinity pool on the 57th floor was the highlight of our stay.
The buffet breakfast had a wide variety of selections.
Amazing view from observation desk!!
Great location!
cons:
Construction going on in a nearby room so we heard drilling two of our 4 days. 
Very busy and crowded hotel.

title: The view and the facility in the room.
pos: The view and the facility in the room.
cons:
Happened to have marathon around the hotel and road blocked everywhere. 
Not being informed and not able to access into hotel by car. Google map and hotel staff both were not able to give right direction to drive into the hotel car park. 
Need to park at Suntec City after detouring on the road for 2 hour plus. Took a mrt to hotel. Finally check in at 6pm. 
This trip was planned for my mother in law who on wheelchair. But not able to bring her due to inaccessible by car ( even taxi , grab, gojek driver refuse to take the job). 
Frustrating/

title: Amazing one time experience
pos: The room had a great view and good size. Definetely an amazing experince while in Singapore but not worth repeating it.
cons: The service was ok but nothing outstanding. You definetely expect more from a 5 star hotel.

title: Bars, restaurants and location
pos: Bars, restaurants and location
cons: Reception for check-in was very slow - unacceptable for a 5 star, famous and expensive hotel. Didnâ€™t tell me about the building works and drilling right above my floor. The room next door had drainage problems that caused a bad smell. I ended up changing to a smaller room, but still paid the same price along with the inconvenience of moving rooms.

title: Great location, nothing special other than that
pos: Hotel location was amazing
cons: It's like a massive shopping mall with a casino attached to a hotel ....feels very impersonal and filled to the brim with tourists trying to access the skypark....feels like a mass chain production hotel ....if you the type of person that likes to be in the heart of tourists then this hotel is for you ...

title: Great stay overall.   My stay went by too fast :-(
pos: The hotel was great!  I really enjoyed swimming upstairs on top of the world  :-)
cons: I didn't enjoy my bed.  I felt as if it was a bit harder than what I am used to.  The mattress I prefer to sleep on is softer and fluffier.

title: This is real architectural wonder!
pos: This is real architectural wonder! Lots of shops, food options, entertainment, transportation under the same roof (although this is quite normal for Singapore). Rooftop infinity pool is amazing. View from the room to die for! Housekeeping did an excellent job looking after all our needs. This was definitely one of the most memorable hotel stay experiences.
cons: Expensive. Huge and crowded - it may take some time to get to the lobby from the lower floors at rush hour around 1030 am - all lifts going down are full. Rooms are quite simple given the exterior and design of the building.

title: First time in Singapore- this hotel is the must!
pos: Of course it's not a cheap hotel. But when you a here you feel "like a boss". View from the room, the swimming pool, stuff- all is top.
cons: The breakfast- very tasty with great viraeties of delicious meals, but costs around 35â‚¬ or 45$ (Singapore dollars).

title: The location is right in the middle of everything and you...
pos: The location is right in the middle of everything and you have direct access tot the galleries and shoppes, the infinity pool is everything you could expect and more, the room is very big and the view is great.
cons: I wouldn't have minded if breakfast was included :)

title: Bay view is terrific !
pos: Bay view is terrific !!! It was so greatfull to watch the city day and night , dark and dawn!!! The hotel is big but very quiet. Everything is organized at the high level. Donâ€™t miss the chance to have breakfast at the highest level by the swimming pool!
cons: The location is extremely comfortable to discover the city!

title: Great experience, although a little pricey
pos: The rooms are beautiful! Really spacious, and fab views.
cons: Not enough staff working by the pool for drinks/food orders. The staff there worked as quick as possible but we waited almost an hour to get a drink and wasnâ€™t able to go to the bar yourself. Once you check out you can no longer use the facilities which is a shame for the amount of money you pay.

title: Sure to visit again
pos: Opted for a Sky View room, extremely satisfied with the size, view and Quality. Plenty dining options available at the property.
cons: Poor Check in Experience. Receptionist -Mark was extremely rude upon check in. Demonstrated poor Listening skills, which was later confirmed with other guests on check in. Would prefer a more professional attitude from the front desk of such a well known , high class property.

title: Good
pos: Infinity pool
cons: Not receiving a confirmation or instruction where we should check in. The hotel have few check in desks and we were sent around back and fort, trying to figure out which desk we should check in at. After 16 hours of flight, the last thing I wanted was to walk back and fort in a long hotel lobby, trying to figure out where we need to check in.

title: Fantastic stay!
pos: Everything was great, thank you Marina Sands for a great holiday! Room service, holding luggage, comfortable bed, great pool and shopping everywhere! Recommend!

title: MORE THAN AMAZING STAY !!!!!
pos:
legendary hotel
everything is JUST PERFECT AND AMAZING
you could imagine with so many rooms and people .... but the staff is incredibly nice and helpful .. especially at the pool
the pool is world masterpiece ...
nothing much to say 
they upgrade me ... they gave me late check out 
this place is a dream
do not hesitate and GO THERE

title: Exeptional hotel with excellent service
pos: From the moment you step out of the car or taxi you are greeted by staff who take your luggage straight to your room. The check in was pleasant and the staff very helpful. The hotel is spotlessly clean, I would go as far to say it was gleaming. the room was beautiful with views of the tall trees in the gardens by the bay. The pool on the rooftop is lovely and there are enough beds to accommodate everyone by the pool.
cons: Take your own photographs in the pool, I had an official photographer take mine, you couldn't buy just one you had to buy a minimum of 3 in a booklet, which initially cost 150 dollars, I got him down to 88 dollars but it was still very pricey for 3 photographs! Just an observation, couldn't fault the place other than this.

title: Great location, beautiful views and modern comfortable room
pos: It was a perfect stay. The hotel is impressive and is a landmark by itself. You will not be bored staying here.
cons: Location, the architecture and beautiful views.

title: Marina Bay Sands - when only the best will do!
pos:
We just had to try out this Singapore icon hotel on the last leg of our journey home to Australia from the UK and we were not disappointed. Our upgrade to a Premier Twin Room on the 33rd floor was huge with a separate walk-in shower, separate toilet and bath in the twin sink change area - all so very clean and spacious.
The S$50 breakfast at Rise Restaurant in the massive hotel foyer was outstanding with a vast variety of different countriesâ€™ breakfast foods.  We enjoyed a leisurely 2 hour brunch! 
My delectable meal at Lavo Italian Restaurant on the 57th floor overlooking Singapore was absolutely stunning.
cons:
It was a nuisance having to take my room keycard out of my bag each time to swipe in and out everywhere we went on the top floor to go from the Infinity Pool to the Observation deck to the restaurants.  
It would be better to give all guests a hotel lanyard with keycard attached (like on cruise ships) to differentiate them from outside visitors.

title: Great Experience
pos:
Very nice experience. Would love to stay there again. 
Nice staff.
cons:
The pool is a little bit crowded but that was expected. 
The water in the pool could be warmer.

title: Fantastic hotel in ther best location
pos:
Amazing views of the gardens from our room. Air conditioning was great and kept us cool after a warm day outside. So much to do. The staff are amazing. Our son left his phone in a taxi on our last day. The hotel staff were incredibly helpful, going the extra m,ile even though we didn't lose it at the hotel.
Best of we recovered the phone thanks to a fantastic taxi driver and the staff at the Marina Bay Sands
cons: These rooms should not be advertised as suitable for 3 people. It had only two single beds and I had asked for room for 2 adults and a 12 year old. The beds were totally inadequate. We had to get an extra bed that we had to pay for, which was disappointing.

title: Excellent pleasant stay. Excellent pool, love the pool
pos: Good view from the 7th floor, clean, orderly, good ambience
cons:
Too long a queue at check in counter & long queue at the lift.
The night club was not operating on night of 20/11/19

title: Just ok I wonâ€™t recommend it unless they improve on food selection and prices
pos: The pool
cons:
Too many people, food selection is extremely poor, the hotel is cater for Asians not for Americans 
No 24 hrs food service anywhere in the hotel and extremely expensive

title: MBS is a CITY by herself.
pos:
Breakfast had a wide array of different cuisine. Location where we had breakfast was right outside elevator hall.
You can actually experience Singapore at the Marina Bay Sands. YOU NEED NOT LEAVE THE PLACE!
cons: Everything was OK to me.

title: Great property and service .
pos: Great property and service ....quite expensive compared to all other hotels but service and room were great
cons: Expensive property but YOU GET WHAT YOU PAY FOR

title: Amazing building, great view even from lower floors,...
pos: Amazing building, great view even from lower floors, relatively good location, easy to access from the metro, the staff is exceptionally helpful.
cons: No shuttle service from the airport, too long waiting time for check-in.

title: An unforgettable experience!
pos:
An unforgettable experience! We were accommodated on the 36th floor with stunning views. The pool is a magical place! It is definitely worth paying for a Club55 room , all with excellent quality and organization!
Thanks the hotel manager for the sweet surprise for our Anniversary!

title: Great pool and view
pos: The infinity pool and the view are magnificent. Nice clean, well appointed room. We loved the curtains that open as you enter the room.
cons: The lobby is terrible. Way too big with no seating whatsoever. After you check out and are waiting for a car, there is literally nowhere to sit.  It resembles a huge airport terminal, with people and suitcases moving about everywhere. And then there are the groups of tourists endlessly being walked through the lobby, making the crowd even worse. This should not be allowed in a hotel of this high price range.

title: I can't get over the views on the 48th floor and the...
pos:
I can't get over the views on the 48th floor and the floor to ceiling windows accentuate them for a truly amazing experience.
I also recommend the Buffet on the ground floor for a great lunch.

title: Novelty of rooftop pool, however again, quite basic.
pos: Novelty of rooftop pool, however again, quite basic.
cons: We didn't check in until 4pm and the room was still not ready, so had the inconvenience of hotel workers in the room whilst we were trying to get ready. Also charges 90 dollars to have a bucket of ice to the room. Very basic standard hotel rooms. Underwhelming.

title: Everything from the staff, they were amazing, they helped me...
pos:
Everything from the staff, they were amazing, they helped me if I needed anything and they made my birthday special. 
The place was perfect, best place I ever spent for my birthday and I cannot wait to come back.
cons: I loved every second of it, I wish I stayed longer.

title: Almost perfect
pos:
Absolutely gorgeous! One of the best hotels Iâ€™ve ever stayed in! 
The balcony was insane. Service was impeccable. The room is very spacious and cozy. I loved all the sunlight and the breathtaking garden view.  
The tub is huge. The bathroom is gorgeous
cons: No bidet or water hose next to the toilet. Very inconvenient.

title: Location was incredible, pool and the views from the...
pos: Location was incredible, pool and the views from the room/roof were stunning.  Bath was an unexpected bonus and enabled me to relax away the effects of long travel.
cons: Access to/from Gardens by the Bay/MRT can be confusing and at times caused me to have to walk a long way round the outside of the hotel, which in the Singapore heat/humidity was not ideal.

title: Best hotel i ever stayed in!
pos: Best hotel i ever stayed in! We had a suite on 51st floor with pool table and fantastic view on Gardens on the bay! Breakfast both on the top floor and also in the lobby was fantastic as well!

title: The staff was amazing, very helpful and they did everything...
pos: The staff was amazing, very helpful and they did everything in their power to give us the best experience at the hotel's facilities. The food was great and the view from the infinity pool and sky deck were breath taking.
cons: Bigger beds to have 3 guests comfortable. It was a bit hard with the bed sizes to have 2 adults sharing.

title: Amazing view!
pos: You will get an amazing view from the room especially if you get the top floors looking down to the bay and the skyline. The bed is very comfortable and the room is sound proofed.
cons: You expect to get a luxurious room but is quite a standard large room. To be really rigorous about the level of the hotel I received 2 conditioners but no shampoo and only one shower gel.

title: Wonder is not enough.
pos:
1-  I reached at 1 PM  a little early from check in time , they upgrade my room to suite to  enjoy my stay and access the room immediately ðŸ‘ðŸ‘
2- infinite pool
3 - Sky observation desk.
cons: Too expensive ðŸ˜¢

title: memorable and priceless . We loved the hotel facilities so much we did not explore Singapore
pos:
location , restaurants and all f&b outlets was amazing efficiency.
cleanliness , hotel design is iconic and an aspirational destination.
cons: truly no feedback

title: A must visit in SG but more of a business & shopping tourist kind of a hotel
pos: The view is magnificent, love the harbour view. The room is spacious and the staff are good.
cons: Other than the view and the rooftop swimming pool, the hotel doesnâ€™t really have a lot of places to explore. The ground level of the hotel felt a bit crammed. It is so near to the shopping centre that the experience felt as if Iâ€™m living in a shopping centre. But itâ€™s not noisy.

title: Marina Sands Hotel
pos: Such an amazing experience. Worth it every penny. Me and my boyfriend got a suite on 13 floor nice view to the Marina Sands shopping. The infinity pool is amazing. We also had some lunch while at the pool. Staff very nice. When we check out we were able to leave our bags in the storage luggage and walk around a lit bit more in the city and also take a shower before catching our flight to Bangkok. They provide a sauna, shower another level experience by the gym so we were able to use after checking out the hotel. Love it.
cons: Hard to say everything was amazing.

title: Only worth 1 night
pos: One of the main attractions of Singapore with the best views of the whole city
cons: You book a room to sit in a tourist attraction, with people scrambling for sun beds and nowhere to really relax

title: The location has exclusive access to many restaurants,...
pos: The location has exclusive access to many restaurants, shopping areas, tourist attraction and even casino in a walking distance.   For shoppers, raining days won't bother coz you'll be staying in a grand one-stop-mall with luxurious space to stroll along.  For light/heavy drinkers, can't miss the signature sky bar.
cons: Great if can replace the plastic electric kettle to a stainless steel one.

title: Wonderful hotel
pos: The welcome starts right from the time you step out of the taxi from the airport. Staff are very friendly and helpful. Beautiful hotel, spotlessly clean. Itâ€™s big, but it doesnâ€™t take long to find your way around. Views of the garden by the bay are wonderful. As a solo traveler, the area is very safe to walk around.
cons: Nothing.

title: Our stay at Marina Bay Sands was fantastic.
pos: Our stay at Marina Bay Sands was fantastic. The views from the infinity pool put just incredible and our Marina Bay view room gave us a great view of the Marina Bay Area too!

title: Amazing views and great service
pos: The staff were extremely friendly and made us feel very welcome from check in to check out. The view from our room and also from the infinity pool was amazing.
cons: No real problems except overcrowding in the lobby making it really hard to get in and out of the hotel.

title: I arrived at the property and got to my room to find a...
cons: I arrived at the property and got to my room to find a terrible drainage/sewer smell in my bathroom. This was reported to the front desk and rectified by the time I returned to my room some few hours later

title: The view from the room and the pool is spectacular.
pos: The view from the room and the pool is spectacular. The hotel is beautiful and right in the middle of the best part of Singapore.
cons: Itâ€™s quite pricy as expected. Breakfast was $50!!

title: Beautiful!
pos: Beautiful! The hotel is absolutely magnificent and breathtaking! Everything is great, the food is delicious, the room is really comfortable and the staff is really friendly, helpful and well trained. Especially Sarah, who did the absolutely most for us, she was really kind and even gave us an upgrade to a better room. The view is incredible and the pool is unbelievably perfect.

title: Extraordinarily beautiful design, clean, perfect attention...
pos: Extraordinarily beautiful design, clean, perfect attention to detail, views and amenities.  However, the staff are what made the difference. First impression sky rocketed when I was greeted by the lobby ambassador, Lee, who personally ensured my smooth and expedited check-in. He also spoke with the taxi drivers giving them explicit instructions as to my destination.  My guest services rep ensured my room was utterly spotless. The room was so spacious and perfect. Iâ€™d stay here again in a heartbeat!

title: Fun
cons:
It was my friends birthday and I had arranged for some sort of birthday surprise for him in the room however we recieved nothing.
Also a horrible smell near the water fountain in the pool by the bar.

title: Superb
pos: I especially liked it that the person who was cleaning our room noticed that I only used the English Breakfast Yeabags. I returned one afternoon to find 4 there instead of the usually only 1.
cons: Nothing

title: Fantastic view
pos: Wonderful hotel in a great location, with the perfect pool. Thank you for the early check-in and the large room with a fantastic view.
cons: As with most hotels, the artwork could be more original.

title: Stunning hotel and very good staff
pos: We got upgraded to a huge room with views of both sides of the building. Very very happy
cons: Nothing. Fantastic hotel and facilities. Will stay here again but for longer next time.

title: Worth adding to your bucket list.
pos: The pool area.  Not is it iconic, the food and drink service was a great accompaniment.  Though expensive, it is well worth a a single night stay.
cons: Pool area was crowed, day and night.

title: The amazing pool, you canâ€™t beat it!
pos: The amazing pool, you canâ€™t beat it! The room service was excellent and staff were very friendly! We tried a few restaurants including club 55 and lavo and both were amazing.
cons: Nothing.

title: Nice to try once. No need to repeat.
pos: Huge hotel convenient to Gardens by the Bay. Beautiful views.  Pool is a sight to behold but a bit too much very quickly.  No real hangout spots without sitting right at the pool.
cons: Lavo was a very bad dining experience.  For all the amazing food in Singapore this was a touristy,  overpriced restaurant with the most mediocre food in all of Asia.

title: Checkin in wasn't that good but kudos to Mr David for making me and family comfortable!
pos: Recommendations for Mr David at the lobby service! Attention to detail, very good customer care and making sure that the guest at the lobby checking in and checking out is very comfortable.
cons:
Started bad but the service is very good!
Spago lack of attention to needs... color coded service too...

title: The room size was good.
pos: The room size was good.
cons:
The price compared to what the hotel offers is too high. 
It didn't give me a personal feeling, it was more of a fast check in to get to the next person. no personal touch.

title: Everything was great.
pos: Everything was great. The room was clean. Amenities and facilities were amazing. Superb experience.  Great location. The Garden View was the best especially in the evenings.
cons: Too early check out time (11am).

title: Loved this hotel.
pos:
Loved this hotel. The staff couldnâ€™t be nicer.
The property is beautiful, spacious and it has a great variety of restaurants and shopping.
The infinity pool is breath taking.
cons: Prices inside the hotel were higher than outside of the hotel.

title: The location is great but itâ€™s over hyped.
pos: The location is great but itâ€™s over hyped. The hotel amenities and the hotel rooms are average. Nothing too crazy. I stayed at The Ritz Carlton right after and the view the rooms the cleanliness and the amenities beats marina sands out of the water any day. It was just to get off the bucket list that I stayed at marina sands. I will be staying at The Ritz anytime I come back to Singapore .
cons: Rooms are average and over priced

title: Totally on trend and in the most happening area for tourists...
pos: Totally on trend and in the most happening area for tourists in Singapore. Lives up to the hype-especially the rooftop pool!
cons: Donâ€™t go if you are looking for a quiet getaway and individual attention! Bars all too loud & dark for chilling out!

title: Most overvalued hotel in Singapore
cons: Noisy water pipes, bathtub was dirty and didn't work properly, very old TV without USB connection. Can't swim in the pool. It's divided into small sections and serves only as a photo prop. Overall way too expensive for what they offer. Not worth the money. I'd highly recommend to stay somewhere else.

title: Too expensive for the room without breakfast.
cons: Too expensive for the room without breakfast. Hot water tap is so confusing. Be cautious. Food is So so only. The pool is too small. Not great as advertised. Dont fall into trap.

title: Always a great experience to see the skyline from the infinity pool.
pos: Pool, great staff, mango juice, bed and pillows, large bathroom and toiletries
cons: Struggled to find our way to Gardens at the bay and back to the hotel.  Need better signage.  Staff helped us with how to get there, then on the way back, a security guard told us the wrong way and our poor elderly moms had to make a big circle near the water and climb steps when all we needed to do was go right instead of left.  We basically made a huge circle.  It would also be nice if hotel guests receive a discount for tickets.

title: Infinity pool was amazing
pos: Infinity pool was amazing
cons: Sign up to a rewards program that doesnâ€™t allow you to get points bra cause it was booked through booking.com and wasnâ€™t told

title: Would never come again.
pos: None.
cons:
Cold-blooded atmosphere without human touch. (already noted it's my daughter's birthday, at least the other 5-star hotel gave a birthday welcome cake)
No breakfast included.
Inconvenient location where you have to walk very far away to get something affordable to eat.

title: A perfect hotel!
pos: It is a great location with many of the sights nearby and the subway system has a underground stop at the hotel/mall which makes it very convenient.  The rooftop pool is amazing and the views are breathtaking!

title: Overrated, overpriced and unfriendly
pos: The pool view is nice but good luck getting service like drinks or food.
cons: Bathrooms smell like urine. Everything was expensive and not worth the value as it did not taste good. Alcoholic drinks were watered down. Staff could not care less about your needs.

title: Perfect 10 for efficiency, customer service, facilities and...
pos:
Perfect 10 for efficiency, customer service, facilities and luxury value! The room has gorgeous view and the bed is super comfortable - I never had a great night sleep like that in months! Lots to do around Marina Sands - everything is a walk away! Great fun.
Seamless check in/â€˜check out process - they did master all hospitality best practices in the book!
cons: The Infinity Pool is awesome but not as much as my expectations. Still a very great experience.

title: The kindness of the check in guy devien who upgraded our...
pos: The kindness of the check in guy devien who upgraded our rooms. It was a beautiful blessing. Thank you for training staff so well. The express check out lady was extremely kind as well. Well done and keep it up.
cons:
No halal food 
Minestrone soup was inedible. 
Mentioned as food 4 thought and much room 4 improvement

title: The check in process for visitors who came all the way from...
pos: The check in process for visitors who came all the way from United States was given an opportunity to check in early.
cons: Price for breakfast was a little bit high, it cost roughly $30 US dollars.

title: Not worthy my money for staying there
pos: I like my room view and the infinity pool.
cons: I didnâ€™t like the staffs at the check in and out offices. They all have the grumpy face and not helping me with my problem.

title: Amazing experience that will leave you wanting more!
pos: From the moment we got out of the car, we greeted taken care of. The staff went above and beyond. Amazing love coming to marina bay sands, always an excellent experience!
cons: The pool was a little overcrowded, but thatâ€™s no ones fault. Ce la vie, the food was great but the service not so much.

title: Amazing building but...
pos: The swimming pool is amazing!!!
cons: The room was normal, my expectation for this luxury hotel was higher. In addition, as I arrived on the floor of my room, I smelt a strange smell. Concierge initially sent a technician (speaking only Chinese) with a device to purify air. I called again the concierge because the smell was still present: we discovered the guest next to my door had durian in the room! This fruit is forbidden in public areas, so I was surprised about this fact happening a luxury hotel. I had the chance to change room, but I didnâ€™t want to loose time to spend in the swimming pool.

title: Spectacular views!
pos:
I had a flight arriving at 4am and was pleasantly surprised when my room was made available to me at this early hour. My room was on the 48th floor with incredible city views, where the light show was visible at night. The suite was huge, with a great bathroom also. The service I experienced throughout the hotel was superb from check in to check out and everything in between. 
The infinity pool was everything I hoped for and although busy, gave me that wow moment I was looking for. You definitely feel like youâ€™re part of an exclusive club up there and made the cost all worthwhile.
cons: The only downside for me was that the bed was a little too firm and the pillows were also pretty flat. For the price you pay (SGD$1300 for 2 nights) I was expecting luxury bedding, instead I found the bed quite uncomfortable and would wake with a sore neck/back.

title: MBS Singapore
pos:
The view from the hotelroom is very nice.
Rooms are spacious and clean.
Nice and friendly staff.
Infinity pool is simply amazing.
Easy access to Gardens of the Bay and shopping mall.

title: Singapore Icon
pos: An amazing hotel - so much to marvel at inside and out. Staff couldnâ€™t have been more helpful. Room was spacious and very comfortable. City view was great
cons: The price

title: Its my second visit to Marina and its still one of our favourites
pos: ambiance of the room was very nice. the staff were very efficient during our stay.
cons: As with every hotel, the tendency to drop the air-conditioning during the nights is common. if there was a small item i did not like, than this was it for us. It was warm during the nights.

title: Beautiful stay
pos:
Everything that the hotel has to offer (easy access to garden by the bay, the domes, bay, future world exhibition, mall, infinity pool and observation desk,...) are awesome. Very clean and beautiful. (Itâ€™s probably why the room prices are so high, because the room itself isnâ€™t necessarily worth that much).
Although, the room was very comfortable and big with good amenities and great bathroom. 
The hotel spa was small (but always nice to have) and the infinity pool is unbelievable.
You also get discounts to shops in the mall and to the science and art museum when you show your room key which is nice.
We were on the 15th floor and had a beautiful view of the gardens with lights shows visible from the balcony which was awesome (even if I definitely recommend going to it to experience it, way more impressive!!)
cons:
The room was noisy, we could hear the road a lot which was annoying when you pay so much! We were on the 15th floor so we canâ€™t imagine what it would have been if we had been lower!!
They definitely should/could have soundproofed the windows more.
The restaurants were all overpriced (as you can expect) but soooo overpriced! I mean even room service was cheap in comparaison. (2 glasses of wines at Lavo cost us 55$) we definitely didnâ€™t expect that! Also they have 17% tax on everything, so the price you see, is NOT the price you will pay.

title: Wonderful
pos:
The room and it's service was just what you expect of a hotel of that caliber, plainly outstanding. The welcome we received from Antonio at the reception, our first impression was just refreshing. He made us feel special. Please let him know we were pleased......
The waitress working the afternoon shift in the pool area restaurant made feel us special.  Allow her to know that, too. On our 2nd day she remembered our last name that was great

title: Perfect!!!!!
pos: Everything. We loved the Hotel. They gave us an upgrade and gave us a better room with a better view and it was amazing.
cons: The Hotel is excellent. We enjoyed everything.

title: Unique experience, but never again!
pos: The view overlooking the Gardens, the pool facilities, comfy bed, quick check-out. Fabulous light show in the evening. Convenient for extensive shopping mall
cons: Have stayed in better rooms in hotels that are a fraction of the price. Lifts were incredibly busy and having to change lifts at the 34th floor to get to the top made it very frustrating. Not sufficient space in fridge and staff unwilling to clear more than one shelf. Poor lighting in the bathroom. Not allowed to use the pool facilities after check-out

title: This was an interesting visit to one of Singapore's iconic sites.
pos: The location is excellent with the property providing a great view and nice experience.
cons: The breakfast selection in Spago is rather limited for such a fancy price place. Also, the service attention in the Rise restaurant could be better, but it was not bad per se.

title: Amazing hotel
pos: Breathtaking view from the room to the harbor , very big room with huge bathroom , very comfortable bed and pillows, outstanding pool area , automatic check-out that took 2 seconds
cons: The price

title: The staff were friendly and courteous, very helpful.
pos: The staff were friendly and courteous, very helpful.  Room was huge, clean, great view from the 43rd floor.  Pool is great and now that itâ€™s only hotel guests allowed it is not as busy.
cons: Priced high.  Everything is expensive in the hotel, from drinks to food,  felt like I was going to be charged for sneezing!

title: Breathtakingly views
pos: Views were incredible, room was spotless.
cons: Sky bar at night- many tables unoccupied but we weren't allowed to sit there unless we were having food (despite spending a small fortune on champagne!)

title: Wonderful
pos: We love the friendly staffs at the reception desk and concierge as well. The room was pretty well managed and clean. Especially mattress was so perfect that we could really take a good rest. We could walk down for the Garden rhapsody show in our flipflops.
cons: We should keep the key cards every time. Even at the pool area for the restroom break. It wasn't much comfortable but understandable since I heard why. Besides that, everything was way much beyond my expectation. Thx.

title: He only one thing which is good: the pool.
pos: He only one thing which is good: the pool. If people would have it for a few, I would jot go there!
cons:
The ce la vi security were unfriendly my Ehe I want to Ente the elevator to go into my room.
My driver was just guard away as he canâ€™t wait in front of hotel, but the expensive cars like mercedes and bmw can do it. This is harassment against other hotel guests. I would not recommend this hotel to any one for longer stay. 1 days is good but thatâ€™s it!

title: Great views. Good location. Hotel and service is functional vs being good. The place has no soul.
pos: Great views. Good location.
cons: Itâ€™s a hotel functioning a factory. There is zero exclusivity for the price you pay. There is no soul to the place. Everyone is herded in and herded out.

title: A bit like in Vegas, nice rooms, interesting pool, casinos,...
pos:
A bit like in Vegas, nice rooms, interesting pool, casinos, shops, etc. 
in contrast to Vegas completely overpriced. Everything belongs in the same hands. You can see Singapore, but you donâ€™t get the real Singapore in there.
cons: Expensive

title: Perfect to stay for two / three days.
pos: I expected luxury and high quality service from this hotel. I can strongly say what I receive everything what I expected.
cons: Maybe price is a bit too high. Food at the pool is definitely to expensive to compare with food quality.

title: The property had a great location but at times it felt like we were in a large Las Vegas hotel.
pos: I liked the amount of space in the room.  Floor to ceiling windows were nice.  Room service and club lounge was nice.
cons: I didn't like the check in process.  Had to wait a long time in the non suite line even though I asked someone if it was the correct line before getting into it.  Didn't like the amount of people that were sometimes in the club lounge, especially during evening time.  Directions to get to the Gardens or the shops were confusing at first.

title: In the whole I am very happy
pos: The view from the room to the gardens was super!!
cons:
Huge cockroach at the main entrance to the hotel, 
I believe that for such money all insects should be sent in the nearest district...

title: PERFECT LOCATION,  GREAT VIEWS, VERY KIND STAFF ON RECEPTION DESK
pos: AMAZING BUILDING, VERY BEAUTIFUL INFINITY ROOF-POOL, GREAT VIEW, IN THE MIDDLE OF ALL IMPORTANT POINTS IN SINGAPORE!
cons: We did not get breakfast included in the price of the stay which is very high.

title: Overall is Fair experience
pos: The front counter are professional and so to the housekeeping, nice location around the central of Singapore.
cons: Facility seem so out of date when it compares with the other hotels with same price level. Also, the room service asking for tips!!! I mean really? The service charge is included !!!And asking for more?

title: Amazing Hotel
pos:
An amazing hotel!!!! All staff was great!!!! Infinity pool is the most amazing pool! You have to swim there with the amazing viewof Singapore!
For us was extra special staying because my boyfriend proposed to me in the infinity pool! 
You must stay in this hotel!ðŸ˜

title: great luxury experience, poolside service could be better
pos: The room was great, the view was great, the bathroom fantastic and the restaurants and rooftop pool area are amazing.
cons: The poolside service is very slow, we always had to wait 30+ minutes for someone to even notice we're trying to place an order, and then the order would take a long time to come too. Another weird thing was that at some point we weren't allowed to do room charge anymore, and we had to go to the front desk to sort it out.

title: A wonderful holiday staying in a fabulous hotel
pos:
I have stayed here before so I knew what to expect. It is on the pricey side but for a wonderful holiday and then to attend a conference it was exactly what I wanted. It is large and busy, but with three towers it is spread out.
It is conveniently located, has wonderful surroundings, and has a metro station close by- you do not even have to leave the complex.
The pool on the 57th floor is out of this world.
cons: Singapore at this time of year is hot and humid, but go prepared for that. It rained only once, but there was some spectacular lightening shows.

title: Loved it!
pos: This was on my bucketlist for so long. Of course it is a lot of money but all worth it. Such a special experience. We had a room on the 46th floor with city view. Could watch the lightshow from our room. View is absolutely amazing. Very friendly staff and the food was great.

title: Just set your expectations right
pos:
Stunning yet not unparalleled views,
Very comfortable beds and rooms, easily matched by establishments of comparable standard,
Stylish decor, elegant fixtures and fittings, again not unmet in other comparable hotels,
Professional and smooth handling of the handover of items accidentally left in the safe
cons:
Mediocre check-in experience,
Not particularly helpful staff,
Perplexing opening time of cafe/bar in the upper deck (opens at midday, no coffee in the evening),
Food poisoning from NiÃ§oise salad bought at Origin+Bloom, boulangerie in the lobby,

title: We are going back by January.
pos: Comfortable room, nice view. Added bonus that made me smile are the towel animals, our guest service agent YA LI change the character everyday for 5 days, i have all the pictures in my phone ðŸ¥°
cons: None

title: We had a brilliant time.
pos: Location was brilliant. Facilities excellent.
cons:
Some very minor points:
Would have liked fresh milk in the room for tea and coffee instead of powder 
Would have liked sleep function on tv.

title: Great facilities and perfect location for tourists.
pos: Staff at the reception was very flexible. When in queue, they told us to go to a room for check in. Infinity pool was clouded but still great with the view, and the towel at the pool was warm and comfortable after getting out of the cool water. The view from our room was spectacular during the day and the night.
cons: There was a hole on the sleeve of the gown in the room on the first day. Expecting more for this level of the hotel.

title: Very happy and very much satisfied costumer ðŸ˜„ðŸ‘!
pos:
Infinity pool experience was exceptional ðŸ˜„ðŸ‘
Providing water with no fee is really a bonus and we really appreciate that specially it's also given at our request for the second day of stay.
Accessibility to transportation and Garden by the Bay is more exceptional!!!!
Quick response for requesting extra stuff for bathroom is much more appreciated as wellðŸ˜˜
cons: Slight difficulty in communicating in English with room cleaner/staff but no harm on usðŸ‘

title: Amazing amazing amazing
pos: Wow just wow. What an amazing hotel. The service is at the highest level. Staff are extremely helpful. The rooms are beautiful we had a room with the garden view which was amazing. This hotel is truly wonderful I will definitely stay here again and will recommend it to everyone. Not to mention the pool over looking Singapore it was seriously a great experience.
cons: Nothing

title: Not worth the hype
pos: Pool has a great view
cons: Without the pool view this would not be a 5* hotel. Service and value for money is beaten by every other hotel in Singapore e.g. Mandarin Oriental, Fullerton etc

title: A very disappointing experience
pos: The location of the hotel is fantastic as it it close by to local activities and parts of the area youâ€™d most likely travel to.
cons: That being said, upon arrival, the room we were given,  was very dated and basic. The robes and all amnesties provided were of cheap quality which I was shocked by. For the price we payed, it is definitely not worth it, especially as it was for our honeymoon. The infinity pool was amazing as expected however it is very crowded and congested, so if youâ€™re expecting a peaceful swim, think otherwise. The sea of people taking photos every second will ruin any chance of you enjoying your view and taking it all in. I only stayed in Singapore to experience this iconic famous hotel however I wonâ€™t be returning neither will I be recommending to family or friends.

title: Excelnt in every way
pos: The hotel is exceptional. From check in to check out the staff were helpful and friendly. the amenities were first rate, especially the infinity pool. The immediate area, particularly the Shoppes at Marina Bay Sands was a welcome stop for food but the restaurants on site were also great - if a little pricey. I would highly recommend this hotel.
cons: The only negative point, which isn't something that can be changed is the location means that although your view is amazing (be this city view, sky view or garden view), the large area of water in front of the hotel that has to be rounded to walk into the city was deceptively long in the hot weather. Less of a negative and more of a tip...take a bottle of water for the stroll!

title: A must visit for the breathtaking view over the city and the pool, of course.
pos: Of course the view and the pool.
cons: No extra stuff or cosmetics in the bathroom, nothing special, standard facility. You receive a bottle of water, some tea and coffee. No breakfast included for the expensive price you are paying for the room.

title: It was simply spectacular!
pos:
It was simply spectacular! The views were out off this world. The hotel simply decedent. One of the highlights of my entire visit and an experience I will never forget. 
Balcony doors open almost fully to allow for great photos. 
Checkout was smooth and speedy. 
The staff are a joy. Porters, Room Attendants, Concierge.  
The bathroom was spacious. The toiletries smelt amazing.
cons:
The bed was super firm. 
Check in took a while and with rooms not being available I would have appreciated being able to use the pool and facilities.

title: Amazing iconic building you can see from almost everywhere...
pos: Amazing iconic building you can see from almost everywhere so it was very easy to navigate towards the hotel on foot. Breakfast wasn't included but I ordered breakfast on room service and it was everything you could want, delivered by very friendly and efficient staff. Incredible views from the 47th floor. The top deck (57th floor) was incredible with the infinity pool, bars and restaurants - loved it all. Can't wait to find a reason to go back.
cons: I would have liked to have stayed there longer. The only negative I can think of is the sheer size of the place makes it hard to navigate sometimes and I could have done with a map or list of facilities and their locations.

title: A brief but fantastic experience
pos: Superb views (of the harbour and the evening light show at the Supertree Grove, to name a couple); very comfortable and clean room + bed; amazing infinity pool; super easy checkout. Only stayed one night, but would happily come back for more!
cons: Check-in was a bit confusing at first; there are different places to check-in depending on which of the three towers you're staying at, and it wasn't clear from the booking where to go. We were quickly directed to the right place though, so very minor.

title: A beautiful once in a lifetime experience.
pos:
Roof top pool was absolutely stunning and the hotel staff were extremely friendly.
The view from our room over the harbor and gardens by the bay was so beautiful and the perfect backdrop to our anniversary.
Would 100% recommend this as a once in a lifetime place to stay.
cons:
There was a fake eyelash on my pillow that the staff were extremely apologetic for but it already grossed out my partner.
There could have been more space in the fridge for our own food and drink.
At one point there were lots of kids in the adult only section of the pool, even after they were asked to leave.

title: Infinity pool
pos: Infinity pool
cons: I would say the only best thing about this hotel is the infinity pool. The rooms are very basic and not up to the value of money spent compared to other hotels more renovated in Singapore

title: Not just a hotel
pos: This place is incredible. The rooms were huge, bed is so comfy, bath is amazing. The pool is out of this world. Great food, friendly staff...I could go on and on. It's an experience rather than a hotel stay.
cons: There is nothing I didn't like.

title: An exclusive experience that weâ€™ll never forget
pos: Everything .... the infinity pool is breathtaking and a once in a lifetime must do. This wasnâ€™t cheap but you pay for what you get and at the Marina Bay Sands, you certainly get to live the high life.
cons: Changing facilities for the pool were not really adequate. Rather odd given the extensive facilities at this hotel but you just need to get ready from your room and use the robs provided.

title: Better than expected
pos: Prime location, facilities were great, amenities were simple, room service food was amazing, house keeping was impeccable.
cons: Requested for an early check-in when hotel was booked. Upon arrival, no rooms were available. Told us to wait for 2hours - still not ready. Waited for 4hrs - still not ready. Only close to 7hrs later when we were restless and annoyed and approached the reception, they gave us our room. Disappointed in the check in staff.

title: After entering the room, the curtain opened automatically...
pos: After entering the room, the curtain opened automatically and the spectacle appeared through the window, was really a whooh feeling.
cons: Separate taps for cool and warm water. It is not an up to date.

title: Exceptional stay
pos: Good food in the restaurants. Beautiful, clean and comfortable rooms. Excellent location that is central to all tourist attractions. Great transportation system with taxi, bus and train at the doorstep.
cons: Everything works extremely well.

title: not cheap but this doesnâ€™t stop the high number of guests
pos:
Biggest hotel room and bathroom Iâ€™ve ever stayed at
Nice towel art provided by housekeeping 
Great view of Gardens by the Bay
Some friendly staff
cons:
Some of the signage in the hotel was not clear initially 
The toilet flush button was stiff and you had to move the raised toilet seat to get to it
Too many guests

title: The first time I went to Marina Bay Sands, I was blown away...
pos: The first time I went to Marina Bay Sands, I was blown away by the proportions of the entire place. It never ceases to impress. Itâ€™s huge, luxurious and the sky pool is incredible. The whole thing is unreal, three huge towers and one of the nicest malls in the world.
cons: The downside of the immensity of the Marina Bay Sands, is that it feels impersonal. A tourist factory with little regards for customer service. Or letâ€™s say very inconsistent customer service, from OK to really unpleasant. Donâ€™t count on special efforts that you might be accustomed to receiving sometimes even for free in other locations. Late checkout, hotel services access on the day you check out or even simply having a car ready for you to take you at the airport at a certain. They are too busy for that and have a lot of other customers to attend to. It seems that as time goes by, hotels just remove more and more of those perks we travelers really enjoy, particularly at this level of pricing. A shame...

title: The hotel was beautiful, very clean and we reviewed a free...
pos: The hotel was beautiful, very clean and we reviewed a free upgrade which was fantastic.
cons: The queue for check in took around 15 minutes, it could have been a little better but other than that the overall stay was excellent.

title: My family & I was very comfortable with your FO ANTONIO...
pos:
My family & I was very comfortable with your FO ANTONIO VALE because he is very accommodating and friendly. We have a very meaningful, memorable and enjoyable experience during our stay with your hotel. We were also amazed with our room especially with a nice view and clean room. 
XI MEI is a very friendly and a smiling staff.  
JIN FU was very helpful and caring assisting our check in and check out baggages.
If ever we go back to singapore (If GOD's will) we will go back in your Hotel.
Thanks
cons: Nothing cause evertyhing is perfect!

title: Perfect
pos: Facilities were top quality and the location was perfect to get to the city and to attractions such as the gardens
cons: Access to the pool ends with check out which is unnecessarily restrictive. If you have a late flight you have to check out early and although you can shower and the hotel will hold your bags, donâ€™t hope to use the pool! Apart from that this was a totally brilliant hotel

title: Great location and clean.  Very impersonal due to the sheer size - no personal touches.
pos: The Infinity Pool in the evening and Lavo Restaurant which which was excellent with friendly and efficient staff
cons: Impersonal, crowded, lifts were very poor.

title: The Infinity Pool was amazing.
pos: The Infinity Pool was amazing. Quite crowded though.
cons: During my stay, My friends an I visited LAVO ITALIAN RESTAURANT & ROOFTOP BAR for a nice drink. We were asked if we were using the bar or the restaurant and we said bar. The lady at the reception told us where the bar was and we headed to the bar. The disappointment starts here, no one approached us after that and we were at lost how to order, where to take a seat as there were no seats available at the bar. We sat down at a random table and again, we were ignored for almost 10 minutes. None of the staff tried to approach us and offered us any help. We finally managed to catch a staff and asked to take orders. He then said that the table was only for Restaurant users and asked us to move out. In a polite way, but we were not welcomed for sure. They did not even try to help us find a place to sit. We were embarrassed and totally disappointed on this service from the restaurant and decided to move out. I was okay with the hotel stay itself, however this incident messed up everything. I will for sure not recommend this restaurant or staying in Marina Bay Sands to anyone.

title: everything was excellent.
pos: everything was excellent. hotel room was very clean and room was big and useful. all hotel person was helpful friendly. hotel location was excellent . if you are in Singapore , you must stay that hotel. infinity pool was incredible. room view was excellent.
cons: no need to write bad comment.

title: The shopping is great lots of variety.
pos: The shopping is great lots of variety. Large room lots of space and giant bathtub.
cons: Room need some noise padding, can hear next door guests laughing and chat so loud.

title: Beautiful hotel.
pos:
Beautiful hotel.
Deluxe king room was lovely and very large.
View from room was amazing (view of city)
Pool is stunning.
cons: It is a large hotel so busy and hectic in lobby areas.

title: Nice experience overall
pos: It's all about the infinity pool which is indeed very impressive. Other than that the rooms are quite spacious and the beds are comfy. As expected, everything in this hotel is overpriced. We had dinner at Lavo, one of the restaurants, which was a complete disappointment and ridiculously expensive. There is absolutely no need to have dinner at the hotel since you will anyway spend time at the pool until late in the evening and you'll get enough of the views. The shopping mall which is connected to the hotel has an incredible food court - better than everything we tried at the hotel - at very reasonable prices.
cons: We had to wait for more than one hour for our room to be ready as the receptionist said that the check-in starts from 15:00 onwards which is not really acceptable for the price you pay. They allowed a later check-in at least as compensation.

title: Spacious room with spectacular view - we were given  an...
pos: Spacious room with spectacular view - we were given  an upgrade without having asked for it. The infinity pool was amazing as was the whole experience. They allowed us to check in early as our  rooms were ready. Staff were very polite and helpful. Would definately stay there again.
cons: The queue to check in was long and the process was quite lengthy.

title: Disappointing
pos: Excellent location and beautiful views from the room
cons:
I was been told at check-in I would be able to use the pool for a few hours after check-out but when I checked out they told me this wasnâ€™t possible.
Because of this wrong information I missed out on swimming in the pool at all

title: The Marina Bay Sands is one of the most amazing Hotels Iâ€™ve...
pos: The Marina Bay Sands is one of the most amazing Hotels Iâ€™ve ever had the pleasure of staying in... The staff is remarkable and unparalleled in hospitality. They made my Birthday the most special it could have ever been! My stay there was truly amazing and I cannot day enough!
cons: There is nothing not to like about Marina Bay Sands!

title: Had an excellent stay.
pos: beautiful facility. Traffic view. Central location to most attractions. Only 15 minutes from the airport.
cons: No restaurants close by other than hotel fine dinning and buffet. long waits for elevator. Easier way to access Shoppes and Garden by the Bay bridge from within the hotel. More eateries and fast food places in or close to hotel. Price was a little high.

title: The best thing was the rooftop infinity pool and the view of...
pos: The best thing was the rooftop infinity pool and the view of the city from the pool!! It was amazingly amazing! People should experience this once in their lifetime!! Other than that, the rooms were very clean and beds were really confortable!!
cons: Only thing missing was a toilet jet spray!! The price is little bit high compared to the check-in check out time of 3 p.m. to 11 a.m. I really wanted to spend more time in the hotel. But still i loved to stay in the hotel!!

title: A night of absolute opulence
pos:
On arrival, we were warmly greeted, and then informed we were given an upgrade.
Taken to the express elevator to the 53rd floor, we were spoilt by the huge 200msq suite which overlooked the Gardens, and included a kitchenette, dining area, lounge, huge bedroom, gym with elliptical trainer, tv and gym ball, and 3 balconies to choose from.
Room service was divine, the pool of course was unparalleled, and the whole experience was just magic.

title: Very short, would love to come again
pos: We used the coffee shop on the ground floor, it was excellent. Loved the restuarants on the top floor.
cons: Lifts, stopping so many times on way down from our floor.

title: One night stay
pos:
- Clean, modern room
- Plenty of luxury amenities
- Slippers and robe provided
- Easy access infinity pool
- Early check in (very fortunate our room was ready early)
cons: - Quite a basic room with standard decor. (But I guess thatâ€™s not the sole reason of staying at MBS)

title: Fantastic Hotel
pos: Everything, i mean its pretty expensive which is a downside. But if you want luxury, then you get what you pay for? PS get to the pool early for a good spot, it gets busy quick
cons: N/A

title: Good experience must stay hotel. Better value hotels in the area If you require more than two nights
pos: Location and the view the rooms where to most value for money.
cons:
The roof pool needs to managed a lot better as far as volume of people and safety. 
Staff in restaurant in main lobby where roof.

title: Enjoyed the experience and views but overy overpriced for what you get, room only.
pos: Amazing view. We had the 49th floor facing Gardens by the Bay and the Singapore Strait. Bed and pillows were extra comfy and it was great to have bottled water free in the room
cons:
Not being able to control the aircon ourselves, my husband now has a cold after only 2 nights. 
Couldnâ€™t get the tv to work and the lobby area and rooftop pool are far too busy and noisy. Also we couldnâ€™t justify the cost of having the breakfast at 59 Singapore dollars per day each so ate out locally.

title: Great location and facilities.
pos: Great location and facilities. Staff are fantastic. Definitely worth a stay if you are in Singapore.
cons: Itâ€™s a huge place! The pool is a tourist attraction and very crowded. Itâ€™s basically human soup from about midday onwards so is not very relaxing

title: Only one night couldnâ€™t say too much , nice and good .
pos: Chairs and sofa on the balcony. Room is high enough to see out the window a view of Garden by the Bay . I also like the Infinity Pool nice and warm . Friendly staff on sight to help out .
cons: None

title: Awesome pool experience
pos: We stayed only for one night but enjoyed the infinity pool a lot. The restaurant at the top of the hotel (Lova) was not good (pasta/slab of chicken for 50 eur) without any good taste. The staff everywhere were very welcoming and helpful, also they allowed us to have a shower on the day of the check out before going to the airport at 9pm. Overall we loved the experience.
cons:
We did not like the restaurant Lova, as it was expensive but did not deliver good food. Also the room was nice but not exceptional - if not the view/access to the pool, it would be like in any other good hotel. 
Our friends had to wait for the check in for 1 hour past advertised check in time and for that the hotel gave us 1 hour late check out.

title: Heaven.
pos: We loved it when we came back into the room after an afternoon of lounging by the infinity pool, and the bed was made up with flower petals and towel swans, with lovely greeting from housekeeping! And the bath had the same petals in them as well. And, the view and infinity pool is just stunning!

title: The ecosystem that it is.
pos: The ecosystem that it is. Choice of fine dining. Restriction of pool to guests only. Facilities impeccable.
cons: Maybe a little too many people overall. But not a deal breaker

title: Location is great.
pos: Location is great. Rooms are amazing. Light show fantastic.
cons: Pool is to busy and a bit disappointing. Food in the Bloom restaurant I can't recommend. Really poor.

title: Easy check out, easy baggage drop, nice location (mrt,...
pos:
Easy check out, easy baggage drop, nice location (mrt, gardens by the bay), easy taxi pickup, nice view from the room, obs deck, and the pool. Great complimentary coffee in the room.
The room itself is clean and comfortable, although did not feel that luxurious to me (surprising given the price). Basically you pay for the view. The bathroom is really nice though. And complete amenities, which is expected.
cons: Long queue during check in. Expensive food in and around the hotel, and not so many options for that. Tiny space in the fridge for personal food and drink.

title: Comfortable beds and great view on both sides if you stay at...
pos: Comfortable beds and great view on both sides if you stay at higher levels (19 onwards).
cons:
Huge building, very unpersonal guest treatment,
Extreme long time and  queue to check in for a 5 star hotel!
Infinity swimming pool with view is mostly overcrowded and athmosphere not really cosy, neither glamorous.

title: Busy /lovely but not relaxing. Glitz and glamor needs a little polishing on the processes.
pos: Location and design of the building
cons: Bags arrived late to the room the Food at the poolside was slow and arrived too late. The noise level at the front by the casino to too high we were on the 6th floor

title: Pool view great but busy.
pos: Pool view great but busy. Lots on site. View from room was unreal and bedrooms generally great and clean.
cons: Unable to use pool when checked out but could use to the shower in the gym which was not great and just a bathroom with showers with nowhere to get changed in private, should provide better areas for guest to prepare for flight. Majority of Staff very rude.

title: Good location, great infinity pool, big clean well equipped...
pos: Good location, great infinity pool, big clean well equipped room. Upgraded to a club room so breakfast, afternoon tea and drinks / snacks were included and were really good. Worth the upgrade.

title: What a fabulous hotel, staff very friendly and helpful, room...
pos: What a fabulous hotel, staff very friendly and helpful, room was fantastic with views out to the gardens, food was exceptional, just a wonderful experience

title: Should have been a better hotel  - stayed 9 days at hotel.
pos: Food was great at breakfast Buffett. Pool is amazing.
cons: Was a bit rundown when you looked and staff while polite seemed much more interested in the upsell than service.

title: The stay was amazing!
pos: The stay was amazing! Hotel is beautiful, location is very convenient, so easy to get around. Many thanks to Hill - receptionist who checked me in! She was very helpful and kind, and explained everything about the hotel. My room attendant (I think Zhu Zhuo) has created very cute towel figures. The pool is gorgeous, will definitely be backâ€™

title: Fantastic hotel with poor staff
pos: The pool is amazing along with the view!
cons: The reception staff is the worst thing you will find, very unfortunate that this eclipse the whole hotel experience, the rest of the staff is ok

title: Unique place to stay in Singapore
pos: Excellent Marina Bay and City View. GREAT experience on the roof top pool and restaurants
cons: Sightseeing visitors are blocking the hotel guests elevators

title: Wow, wow & wow
pos: Firstly the check out lady Devi was fantastic, she upgraded us so we could get access to our room early (1130am) we had a massive room over looking Gardens by the bay, our bathroom was huge with a deep bath & walk in shower room. The hotel is just incredible. The sky deck infinity pool was amazing, cool, chic & relaxing.
cons: That we had to leave!!!

title: Lovely city stay - very clean and relaxing. Great situation
pos: It was really great to come back to a lovely, cool interior as respite from the scorching heat outdoors. The fact that the hotel is linked by a short walk to a great shopping mall is very very convenient. The walk around the bay outside the hotel towards the Fullerton on the opposite bank was really relaxing in the late evenings.
cons: The crowds !! Being such a large hotel - there were increasing numbers of holiday-makers ( not sure whether they were guests or general public ) streaming through the hotel lobby at all hours of the day and night

title: I loved it.
pos: This hotel has everything: great location, facilities, and services.  It is really a five star hotel.  We had lunch at the Blossom and it had wonderful food and service.  We will definitely stay at this hotel again.
cons: Nothing

title: Nice  comfortable but a bit uncomfortable after checkout
pos: Good location, nice views, infinity pool, viewing deck
cons: Lobby was like a market place, no privacy, no where to relax before check in and particularly after check out. The flight was at midnight and had to checkout at 1pm

title: I loved the pool and the view and as they say in property  .
pos: I loved the pool and the view and as they say in property  .......location, location, location !!!!
cons: I did not like having to stand in long lines to check in and out. I do realise that there are 2600 rooms but surely in today's day and age and after a long flight to stand in line and wait is not necessary, the process should be speeded up.

title: Marina Bay Sands is Singapore!!
pos: There are many things to do. The infinity pool on top promenade has an amazing view. The Garden by the Bay were also fantastic. We needed more than 2 nights to make use of all available activities.

title: The location was great, lots to see and do nearby.
pos: The location was great, lots to see and do nearby. The iconic rooftop pool. The facilities, staff welcome and helpfulness. The cleanliness of all the facilities and rooms. The amenities provide.

title: Everything was immaculate and maintained throughout the day,...
pos:
Everything was immaculate and maintained throughout the day, which is amazing considering there are 2000+ rooms
Views are great, food is good
cons: Food and drinks seem far too overpriced especially considering they are then taxed as well

title: What a lovely treat.
pos: Had club room with city view . This was superb with amazing views. The extras provided with club room were well worth the additional cost. Afternoon tea (served 2 - 4pm), canapes and drinks (5 -7pm) were amazing. The food was buffet style so you do not need to eat again for the rest of the day. All drinks were served by waiting on staff who were efficient and friendly. Although check in wasn't until 3pm we checked in just after 1pm and our room was ready. This meant we had time for a quick dip in the pool before afternoon tea started. The pool is spectacular. It was fairly quiet at 1pm as previous days guests had checked out and new guests were still checking in.
cons: Nothing

title: Fantastic place with fantastic staff! Will be back!
pos: The whole entertainment system was superb and the hotel is simply grand! Very much worth the visit!
cons: The toilets have no bidet. It would have been easier especially if you have kids

title: Best vacation ever
pos:
Very friendly staff most of the speaking English 
All staff from club 55 was excellent itâ€™s no word for it how excellent were they are
cons: Jus internet speed is kind of slow

title: It was a bucket list experience that I'll never forget.
pos: The was very delicious they also had many different styles of breakfast to accommodate different types of breakfast eaters from all over. It was much appreciated.
cons: I actually thought my room had a balcony but it did not. Although that wasn't so it was still fine because of the neon jungle view it was beautiful.

title: Pool and view are amazing
pos: Pool and view are amazing
cons: Itâ€™s more like a luxury prison camp. Key card required to go EVERYWHERE, which I understand for security reasons. But once you access the pool area with your pass, do you really need it again to go to the bathroom?! staff donâ€™t care, are quite rude and feel they are superior as they work for MBS. Checked in with a lot of luggage which WE carried, no staff offered to help once we got out of the taxi! SHAME ON YOU MBS....

title: VÃ½jimeÄnÃ½ zÃ¡Å¾itek
pos: We had accommodation on the club floor including an afternoon and breakfast buffet with spectacular views. On the day of departure, after check-out, there was a possibility to use the fitness facilities for the afternoon shower and hygiene.

title: Bags were taken off us immediately and dropped to the room...
pos: Bags were taken off us immediately and dropped to the room after we checked in. Thacha checked us in and she couldn't have been more kind. She was on hand with water for us and explained everything to us so clearly. Our room wasn't ready so she gave us an upgrade! The rooms are very spacious and well equipped. Room service is amazing! We watched the Gardens by the bay light show from our balcony while eating dinner! Pool is incredible and a lovely place to chill day or night. There is a luggage store and shower facilities also for after check out. Worth any amount of money!

title: The view from our city view club room at 37th floor was just...
pos: The view from our city view club room at 37th floor was just amazing. Great quality of the food served and service minded staff gave us a excellent experience. Even the baby cot was of great quality ðŸ˜Š

title: Location was good.
pos: Location was good. Extremely expensive to eat at MBS whichb is to be expected but the food hall nearby at the shopping centre  reall;y good.  Food by the pool great. :)

title: There are not enough words to describe the amazing...
pos: There are not enough words to describe the amazing experience this hotel is! A minimum 2 night stay is desirable here to take full advantage of the pool., so bite the bullet and book! We will remember our stay always.
cons: My wallet is still crying out in pain!!

title: It is a huge and beautiful building with many options and...
pos: It is a huge and beautiful building with many options and balcony
cons: One day they did not come to clean the room and the towels had bad smell. The water was not hot enough

title: Worth every penny!
pos: Did not have breakfast.
cons: Loved every minute of my stay and I wish that i could have stayed longer! The staff at the pool were extraordinary and I always felt like I was receiving special treatment.

title: Excellent
pos: The atmosphere, the design, the view, it was very comfortable, i would most definitely come back to visit in the future.
cons: This isnt their fault or something they could change but i would like the balcony to have a little more room, but other than that, that's about it.

title: The hotel is absolutely perfect!
pos: The hotel is absolutely perfect! When we checked in they upgraded our room and gave us  the key earlier than check in time. The pool is incredible. The staff is so friendly and ce la vi club at sky park is so much fun
cons: The elevators need a little upgrade you never know which one is coming and you have to go trough all and check

title: Amazing views poor and expensive service
pos: Location, decor and views
cons: Property too big and impersonal. Crowded pool area with lack of seating. very expensive f&b options. Weak alcohol drinks for the price. Elevators too crowded and took to long

title: Perfect place
pos: Comfortable bed! Big room with a view over the city. Really nice staff (big thanks to Mansor for his great assistance at the check-in). Although it is a big hotel with hundreds of rooms, the rooms are quiet and you may feel relaxed there!

title: Thanks to Maria, she gave me the best view room from 48th...
pos: Thanks to Maria, she gave me the best view room from 48th floor Tower 3 i soooooI love it......me and kids really enjoy + relaxing view... Thank you For the birthday cake, my son really likeâ€™s it.....till next time!
cons: Why you donâ€™t have a bidet in bathroom...how can I wash my private part how?

title: Everything comes with a price
pos:
- best view
- infinity pool access
- very central (in the center of the marina, metro nearby)
- modern architecture, modern hotel room
- high class bath facilities
cons:
- overpriced
- crowded

title: Cleaning, staff, room, pool.
pos:
Cleaning, staff, room, pool.
What can i say...a big 10+ for staff...from the arriving till i left i had all staff being so caring. very clean rooms and good hotel service. Great experience!

title: Amazing roof infinity pool
pos:
Amazing roof infinity pool
Very large room and bathroom
Perfect view from room and from roof
Perfect staff
Direct access to gardens by the bay and to mrt via mall

title: Amazing  Stay  at the MBS, Singapore!
pos: Location, MBS is so near to the Garden By the Bay, Clark quay, musical  fountain, Merlion and many others. The view on the roof top is amazing!
cons: The infinity pool is over crowded ..we did not manage  to swim in it. Just too crowded

title: The pool was cool the rest of it is hugely average and there...
pos: The pool was cool the rest of it is hugely average and there are way nice hotels to stay in in the city!
cons: The staff ... disengaged and took ages to get anything

title: My partner and I loved the infinity pool.
pos: My partner and I loved the infinity pool. One of a kind it was!
cons: I have stayed in many hotels around the world. Marina Bay Sands was amazing however not a great value for money. There should be at least teas and coffees provided  free of charge by the pool in the morning and an additional discount voucher provided for food throughout the day.

title: Marina
pos: The infinity pool and the hotel location
cons: Quite overpriced rooms. The bathrooms didn't have a nozzle. The toilets could have been more lavish with a bath. We were essentially paying to use the amazing infinity pool. For such an expensive hotel, I'm very disappointed that they have no halal option for in room dining.

title: You're in Singapore and staying at MBS, get out your wallet!
pos: Beautiful view from room of the gardens by the bay, love the location, great pool deck and plenty of restaurants and shopping all around.
cons: Very pricey for what you get, would expect a bit nicer room and amenities for the price paid.

title: Low privacy
pos: Location and the architecture of the building
cons: Too busy lobby. Doesnâ€™t exist separation between guests and public. Swimming pools too much crowed. Price level too high.

title: A great place in Singapore
pos: Great infinity pool and view over the bay and the gardens by the bay
cons: Breakfast quality is good but better in other 5 star hotels in Singapore so I would recommend to try the breakfast in the marina bay sands and other hotels too. The Ritz Carlton is close to the marina bay sands and has a great breakfast for nearly the same price (2$ more)

title: Fantastic room service and food
pos: I liked the room service, it was unbelievable excellent, the person who in charge of the room was GAO Qun, I definitely want to give him seven star for her fabulous service;)! We had amazing trip because of our stay at MarinaBaySands! Thank you for all the wonderful experience and staffs.

title: We were here on honeymoon very responsive and pleasant staff.
pos: We were here on honeymoon very responsive and pleasant staff. Pool obviously but no one swims people just take selfies
cons: Very outdated for a super hotel no milk with tea why provide English breakfast tea bags if you have to use coffee. Hotel decor was outdated and tired

title: The hotel was outstanding
pos: The food was outstanding
cons: The location is a perfect location, the staff was extremely friendly and helpful. The hotel is more then I imagined, totally the best.

title: Not a hotel, a great experience...
pos:
Take in consideration that this is a really BIG hotel that has a shopping mall and a casino. This is an iconic hotel, all that it has is just superb, restaurants, bars, facilities, views, shopping...just great.
Room and bathroom are big and comfortable, any view is great if you are in a high floor.
Pay a visit to sky bar and if you are lucky to have Nirmala serve you, you are inn for a great time, she made our 40th anniversary great!
Don`t forget to book restaurants in advance, they are GREAT.

title: Well worth the price tag!
pos: This is an expensive hotel, but it is, without a doubt, the most luxurious hotel Iâ€™ve ever stayed in. We didnâ€™t want to leave! The food, the pool, the rooms, and the overall facilities are exceptional.
cons: When you check out of your room you canâ€™t usw the pool facilities which was a pain for us as our flight wasnâ€™t until 11pm.

title: Over-hyped hotel
pos: Rooms are nice, big and modern. You get a nice view of the city- staff are amazing!
